foreignObject.div: Use the free tier to try out the service
Access a single Azure AI resource with a unique key and endpoint for each service created
Consolidate billing from the services you use
Access multiple Azure AI resources with a single key and endpoint
Evaluates pronunciation and provides feedback on the accuracy and fluency of speech
Derives user intents from transcribed speech, and act on voice commands
Identifies and verifies the people speaking based on audio
Identifies languages spoken in audio when compared against supported languages
Translate streaming audio in real time and provides result as text synthesized speech.
Converts text to natural sounding speech
Supports immediate results, end-of-speech detection, automatic text formatting, profanity masking, and includes real time speech to text and batch transcription.
Innovating responsibly, empowering others, Fostering positive impact
Azure AI Search : Key Knowledge Mining solution
AI Document Intelligence Studio helps in extracting text, key value pairs, tables and structure automatically from documents.
Speech solution is designed to ensure apps can recognize and decipher written and spoken text.
Azure AI Video Indexer: Extracts insights from video
Document Intelligence: Extracts text, key-value pairs, and tables from documents
Azure AI Custom Vision Service: Builds custom image classifiers
Face API: Detects and recognizes face
Azure AI Vision : Processes images and returns information
